root: ^What do you mean there's blood outside the dressing rooms?
^I think that's where the murder happened.
^I don't have to clean taht, do I?
^You don't have to do a thing. I just wanted to know if you had been around there earlier.
^Yes, I want to know if the blood is fresh or not.
^Oh, right. I did make a roung over there this morning.
^I... I don't remember seeing any blood, though.
^Thank you, that's all I need to know.
^THat must mean the murder happened there. The murderer must have moved the body... for some reason.
